addMeasurePoint

public void addMeasurePoint(java.awt.Point pos)
Adds a new measure point. Details: when setting the scale, user needs to select 2 points on the screen, then writes the real distance between them in the real world. so, this method adds a new measure point (the first one or the second) there is a thread responsible of handling the two points.

Parameters:
pos - position of the new point (x,y)

setController

public void setController(ControllerUI controller)
Description copied from class: BaseUI
